It is contained in the RPM clone-1.0-11.s390x.rpm. #!/bin/sh # # clone.sh is a script that clones Linux images. It makes use of vmcp to # relay messages to the z/VM system and configuration files to modify # the new image once it has been cloned. # # The script reads in /etc/sysconfig/clone
